name: neiltyson

name: neiltyson
text:
It’s official: My first-ever word adopted into the Oxford English Dictionary (@OED).

***Manhattanhenge***

Took them long enough!  First coined the term back in 2003.

name: neiltyson
text: @sarahmceneaney Good catch. But there’s a boatload of information in that tweet. After 20 minutes of trimming, only after removing two periods did I finally equal the character limit, which (unfortunately) prevented further improvements in grammar.

name: neiltyson
text:
Happy September Equinox to planet Earth

We say Day equals Night but it’s not true. There’s extra minutes of day because our atmosphere Refracts light from space, prying the Sun’s image above the horizon before it actually rises and delaying sunset until after it has actually set

name: neiltyson
text: How egocentric of us to think that Space Aliens, who have mastered interstellar travel across the Galaxy, would give a shit about humans on Earth. https://t.co/nJy5BEa3zm

name: neiltyson
text: Of course younger people are more concerned than older people about Climate Change.  In decades to come, they’re the ones who must live in the World that the rest of us have borrowed from them.

name: neiltyson
text:
In case you never noticed, the Los Angeles @Angels baseball club, when rendered in one language, translates to “The The Angels Angels”

And while in LA, why not visit the La Brea Tar Pit — “The The Tar Pit Tar Pit”
